about_the_game:
This DLC contains new Doodle Devil episode with 200 elements to create.
While Doodle God was busy creating the universe, Doodle Devil was also having some fun. Discover the seven deadly sins and watch as the world crumbles at your fingertips as you create thousands of dastardly deeds. Combine fire, earth, wind & air to create demons, beasts, zombies... and much more. Being bad has never been so much fun!
Embrace Your Dark Side with Doodle Devil!
